content: @WG-learning hey, as promised in yesterday's meeting I've organized a bit the documents
our starting point would be the Master document

• Tasks
  • Topics to cover next
  • Link to Agenda document
  • Link to Check-ins document
we have 3 documents, master that contains all, agenda and check-ins, those two are very specific, agenda is for our meetings and check-ins is where we can keep track of updates for the compiler team
feel free to fix anything that's not nicely explained or whatever people feel like fixing in the docs :)
